name: Do not add points during Character Creation
Have at least 24 different items in your inventory
Cross the Trapped Room while the Archers are active and don't get hit
Get both the Troll's Beard and some Cheetaur Claws
Only visit the Character Creation once
Give Fred's beard to the healer
As a Magic User, rescue Barnard without waking the Kobold
Defeat the brigands at the front gate
Get removed from the premises by Crusher, Erasmus, and 'Enry
Give Fred's beard to the healer
